attributes.action: Legalise the use of cannabis for cancer and other patients in need of much pain relief.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We think that cannabis should be legalised only for prescription by a doctor. It has many good effects for pain relief and if the amount and quality is controlled by drugs proffesionals there should be no reason for it to become addictive or even unhealthy.
